div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
xiij die Junij anno quo supra

The saide day Williame lammyntone grantit avand' to pekale
v s' and v d' Ande gif he cane preif him avand ony mair'
he sal pay it

Eodem die Willelmus andirsone Jacobi deuenit plegius legalis quod patri
cius adams Relicta quondam Willelmi adamsone burgensis dicti burgi et Dauid
adamsone filius suus erunt Indempnes pro patricio adamsone filio
suo et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et Walterus auchneyve
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus patricius erit Indempnes pro dictis mariota
matre sua et dicto Dauid et parte sua aliter quam per viam iuris Et quilibet
dictarum parcium obligatur pro ostendentem manuum suarum ad conseruandum suos legittimos
plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione per terras et bona

The saide day the ballieis decernit the copy of the procuratory producit
be henry forbes in Jugement to the forspekaris of marione
nachty and assignit monunday cum xv dais to hir' to ansuer
to the said henry as law wile

The saide day thomas glenmaluyn oblist him be the fatht of his
bodie to pay to gilbert menyeis ane barrele of Salmonde
sufficient merchand' gude at the fest of Sanct peter callit
lammes next eftir follouing' for Redy money pait to him
Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xiiij die Junij anno quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Robert
of Culane forspekar that patrik mudy sale resaue the brokin
Siluer fra the wif of Dauid gichtane and pay hir' the remanent
of the Siluer that is viij s' and ix d' for Ilkan vnce of the Siluer is sufficient

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' tho
mas mar forspekar that William richerdsone sal deliuer to Alexander
chamer yongar his part of wyne bocht fra him be Androw Culane
and the said Alexander / Ande the said' Alexander sal deliuer him the woll
and mak it als' gude as thre flesys that the saide Williame
saw

the samyn day it was Statut and ordanit be the aldirman
and diuers' of the Consal that gif euire Androw branche
or mathou branche one that ane part Ande Richerd' ruthirfurd'
one that vthir parte committis ony offens' tile vthiris and beis conuikit
tharof sal pay xl s' to Sanct nicholes werk be thar
avne oblisinge and fathtis of thar bodiis

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
Junij Anno quo supra

The said' day James colisone In the nayme and behalff
of ane richt worschipfule clerk mastir Adam gordone
chavntouris of murray deliuerit to Jonhne moir' Sone and
ayr to wmquhile androw moir' ane Retour' of ane breyf
ydotry Selit with certane Selis that Alexander glastre
his modir brothir was fundin ydeot In presence of Alexander Iruyn
of lummey seref of abirdene Alexander Red' aldirman sere Jhone ruthirfurd'
Robert blinsele mastir Jonhne badenaghe

Eodem die Willelmus buchane legittime vocatus ad respondendum plegio super ipsum
porrecto per Johannem blak quod tenetur Inponere vnum serplarium lane inter
ipsos in Naui sibi placen' prout in acto precedente lacius continetur
non comparuit Igitur precipitur philippo Dunbrek seriando capere districtum
ab eodem ipsummet premunire hodie ad quindenam ad comparendum eidem
respondentem tanquam quarto die huius processes

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die Junij
anno quo supra

The samyn day Robert huker inglis man was quyt of xvj s'
follouit be thomas chamer be ane Suorne assis' thomas
mar' forspekar and the said thomas in ane Amerciament of the courtis for the
wranguis' follouing of the saide xvj s' be Strintht of ane borghe
and the said' Robert quyt of his challance

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die Junij anno
quo supra

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' William
portar forspekar that the mastir of the franche Schip sale
deliuer to gawane Diky ijM yrne and he sal resaue the rema
nent of the kelinge fra the said' gavane and gif thai be nocht mer
chand' gude he sal mak thame merchand' gude be the sicht
of Suorne personis vnsuspek

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimo die mensis
Junij Anno quo supra

the saide day Jonhne of myll duelland at the Justice myll
has dravin and oblist his hande and his gudis to Amend' and vp
richt the skatht done and gif ony happinis eftirwart to be done
be his skabbit hors' to sere Jonhne ruthirfurdis gudis and al vthiris
gudis becaus' the saide hors' ar forbodyne gudis

The samyn day lindesay harrald' was in ane amerciament of
the court be his avne tounge graunt for strubulance of the court

The samyn day Androw goldsmitht was conuikit be ane Suorne
assis' Alexander chamer of murchile for the wranguis' hevin of patrik
lesleis barrouis Ande als' the said' androw was conuikit for the
contemning of the aldirman and officiaris of the tovne in the commiting of the
said' strubulance And' the saide patrik was conuikit for the wrang
uis' strubulance of Androw goldsmitht And als' for the contemying
of the aldirman and officiaris in commitinge of the saide strubulance
And' William leslie was conuikit for the strubulance of the said' Androw
and Ilkan of the said' personis to Amend' tile vthiris as law wile
and forbeir' in tyme to Cum

the saide day it was Statute and ordanit be the aldirman and
Consale for the amendis of the offens' and strubulance committit
be Androw goldsmitht and patrik leslie in contrar' vthiris and for the
contemning of the officiaris that Ilkane of tham sal pay x s' to
the bigin of the boll brige and Ilkane j li' of wax one sonday
that next cumis to the haly blud licht And' neuer ane of thame
sal cast in the said' myer' in tymes to Cum / And' gif euire
ony of the said' personis offendis tile vthiris in tyme to Cum Ande
beis conuikit tharof he sal pay fiwe markis vnforgevin to Sanct
nicholes werk to the quhilkis ordinance batht the said partiis
ar oblist be the fathtis of thar' bodiis

the saide day It was Statute and ordanit be the consal that lindesay
harralde sal ask the aldirman and ballieis forgevnes for the
strubulance done in the courte

Eodem die Johannes blak fecit constituit creauit et nominauit magistrum
alexandrum fyf Willelmum Wormet et Andream fyff coniunctim et diuisim
suos legittimos procuratores ad prosequendum Willelmj buchane pro duo sarplariis
lane secundum tenorem suj plegij super ipsum porrecti ad agendum defendendum
promittendum de Rato et grato Judicio Cisti et cetera cum omnibus clausulis
et terminis necessariis et oportunis

The saide day it was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' William
blinsel forspekar that Androw bety sal pay vj s' and viij d' to the
leche for the hurtinge of Sandy malisone and Als' the saide
Androw sal find' ane seruand' to werk at the wattir for Sandy
malisone quhil the said' Sandris be haill and may werk
him Selff or ellis pay ane mannys fee that labouris for him

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxv die Junij anno
quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod margareta Kintor sponsa
alexandri myrtone est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus heredibus quondam
Roberti Kintor patris suj

The saide day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane assis' thomas
prat forspekar that patrik leslie was in ane amerciament of the court becaus'
he fulfillyt nocht the ordinance of the Consal deliuerit obefor

The samyn day the ballieis assignit monunday cum viij dais
to marione nachty to ansuer to the procuratory producit be henry
forbes as law wile and ordanit thomas Jamesone officiar to
pas' and warne hir to the saide day

The said day Sandy teile was conuikit be ane assis' William
blinse forspekar for the Strubulance of Androw mathesone and his brothir

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Robertus glen
maluyne est filius est legittimus ac propinquior heres quondam
murdaci glenmaluyn patris suj

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
primo die Julij anno quo supra

Eodem die actio debatabilis inter Johannem blak et Willelmum buchan
continuatur per prepositum et balliuos vsque diem lune proxime futuram absque preiudicio
alicuius partis

Curia legalis balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
octauo die Julij Anno quo supra

The saide day Alexander rede aldirman forspekar for marione nachty
allegit that the procuratory producit be henrik forbes In the nayme
of Riche nachty was nocht of waile becaus' he was nocht of
perfit age quhen he maide the saide procuratory Ande the said henry
tuk to preyf him of lauchful age and askit ane day of law
to his preif Ande the balyeis assignit to him this day xx dais
to preyf his saide allegeance Ande the aldirman protestit for mair
resonis' to be schevin that day

The samyn day thomas menyeis follouit george brone for the wranguis'
haldin fra him of ane barrele of Salmond quhilkis he denyit
and in continent It was put to the decisione of ane assis' of thir personis
vndir writin that is to say William blinsel Androw branche thomas
mar' Dauid mar' thomas Waus Jonhne moir' Jonhne portar and Symon'
gardin quhilkis riplie avisit the greit aithe Suorne deliuerit be
the moutht of the said' William blinsel forspekar of the said assis' that
thai continevit the said matir to this day xv dais to the hame
cuming of Dauid Steuarte

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die Julij
anno quo supra

Eodem die Willelmus portar fecit constituit creauit et ordinavit honorabilis viros
Alexandrum Iruyn de Drum Ali dominum Johannem ruthirfurd' de tarlane thomam
prat et Willelmum blinsel coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores
ad defendendum terram suam in le gastraw et in omnibus aliis actionibus
ipsum concernentibus promitten' de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij
ad agendum prosequendum et defendendum et cetera Judicio Cisti et Judicata
Soluere cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xij die
Julij Anno quo supra

The saide day the aldirman schew that he sende thomas Jame
sone and Androw nachty officiaris to sek Dauid prat and Jonhne
menyeis tua of the ballieis of Abirdene et cetera

The samyn day the aldirman perofferit the rentale of the towne
of wattiris malis and landis malys to Alexander chamer and Johne
menyeis tua of the ballieis of the said' burghe requirand' tham
that thai and thar fallouis wald gathir' the said' malis
sua that the xiij markis aucht to our Souerane lordis hienes and vthiris
pensionis to the lordis may be pait and he offerit him redy to
ber' the said' xiij markis to the chaker and bring hame sufficient
acquitance tharof and thai wald' deliuer to him the said' money

add.foreign: exoneracio prepositi de fabrica operis Sancti nicholaij

div.p:
The samyn day the aldirman present his compt of Sanctis
nicholes werk and offerit him redy to vndirly the consale
or certane Sworne Auditouris tharintill and dischargit
him of the said' werk

The said day Alexander chamer and Jonhne menyeis tua of the balyeis
of Abirdene allegeit that thai war dischargit be my lorde chanclar'
and the lordis of our Souerane lordis consale of al Intromettinge
and vptakin of the malys of the said' burghe and ane thesaurar'
chosin to resaue thame and the commone gudis of the towne tharfor thai wald'
nocht Intromett with the said' malis Neuirtheles' wald' the aldirman
or thesaurar' pas' to gathir' in the saide malis thai wald' pas' with
thame and furthir and help thame at thar pouer' bot thai walde
nocht resaue thame

Curia balliuorum tenta in pretorio eiusdem xix die Julij
anno quo supra

The samyn day thomas Waus lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht compe
rit to ansuer to pakar Tuniter for alevin li' and x s' comperit
tharfor the balyeis chargit philp Dunbrek officiar' to pas' and tak
ane distreis' fra the said' thomas and latt it to borghe' gif it be
askit and warne him to comper to morne to ansuer' to the
said' pakar as law will

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem quod Johannes oyge
est filius et heres legittimus ac propinquior quondam thome
oyge Incole huius burgi

div.head: Nomina assise ad Inquisicionem Elene Knollis
div.p:
Willelmus Kintor Johannes grige Johannes Sanclar Willelmus andirsone senior
Andreas lousone Willelmus Wormet Andreas muresone Andreas lammyntone
Dauid Duffous Jacobus andirsone Duncanus talyouris thomas litil
Jonhne et thomas Culane burgenses dicti burgi dicunt quod quondam Johannes
Knollis auus Elene Knollis latricis presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus
de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis de vno annuo Redditu xv s'
de terra Alexandri logy Jacente in dicto burgo in vico furcarum ex occidentali
parte eiusdem vici inter terram Roberti blinsele ex australi et terram Willelmj
buchan ex boriali Et de vno annuo Redditu sex s' et octo d' de terra
antedicta ipsius Willelmj buchane in eodem vico inter terram dicti Alexandri
logy ex australi et terram Johannis lundoris ex boriali Et de vno annuo
redditu decim s' de quadam terra vasta Roberti blinsele in eodem
vico inter terram dicti Alexandri logy ex boriali et aliam terram constructam
prefati Roberti ex australi et communiones vias regias versus oriens et
occidens Et quod dicta Elena est vna de legittimis et propinquioribus
heredibus quondam dicti Johannis auj sui de predictis annuis redditibus cum
partiis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod tenentur in capite de Suppremo
Domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium et nunc existunt In manibus
dominj nostri Regis per quatuor menses aut eocirca in defectu veri
heredis Jus suum minime prosequentis
